{{Wireless embedded system |brand=RPF |model=Raspberry Pi 3 |revision=Model B (1GB) |price=35 |manuf_country=UK |is_manuf=No |manuf=Sony UK |availability=now |est_release_date=03/2016 |fcc_date=02/26/2016 |fcc_id=2ABCB-RPI32 |ic_id=20953-RPI32 |type=single-board computer |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp= |pwr_conn=USB Female Micro-B |cpu1_brand=Broadcom |cpu1_model=BCM2837;BCM2837RIFBG; |cpu1_cspeed=1.2 GHz |cpu1_cores=4 |fla1=0 |ram1=1 GiB |ram1_brand=Elpida |ram1_model=B8132B4PB-8D-F |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=4 |serial=yes,, 3.3V TTL,, (115200 8N1) |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if=SDIO |wi1_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip1_model=BCM43438 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_txchains=1 |wi1_rxchains=1 |wi1_sstreams=1 |eth_chip1_brand=SMSC |eth_chip1_model=LAN9514;LAN9514-JZX; |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |addl_chips=3-pin Microprocessor Reset Circuit;Diodes Inc;APX803;;1;,,, Dual PWM Step Down DC-DC Converter;Diodes Inc.;PAM2306;;1;,,, 45V Matched Pair PNP Signal Transistor;Diodes Inc;BCM857BS;;1;,,, P-Channel Enhancement Mode MOSFET;Diodes Inc;DMG2305UX;;2;,,, 2.7MHz, 3A Step-Down Converter w/ I2C Interface;Richtek;RT8088A;;1;,,, 1.5A/0.7A High Side Power Switch for USB;Richtek;RT9741CVG;;1;,,, Ultra High Speed Dual Buffer;On Semi;NCWZ16;;1; |flags=Micro SD Card slot, Bluetooth 4.1 LE, A/V out (3.5mm), HDMI out, GPIO, DSI, CSI |802dot11_protocols=bgn }} :[https://www.raspberrypi.org/products/raspberry-pi-3-model-b/ Product page]{{â€¢}}[https://www.raspberrypi.org/blog/raspberry-pi-3-on-sale/ Blog]
{{See also|RPF Raspberry Pi series|List of SBCs}}
{{WPLink|Raspberry Pi}} :[http://elinux.org/RaspberryPiBoard '''Elinux.org''''s Raspberry Pi subsection] :[http://elinux.org/RaspberryPi_Boards Board revision table w/ pictures]
Apparently the Wi-Fi chip BCM43438 identifies itself :as BCM43430 (SDIO device ID a9a6)
===Reviews=== *[http://www.cnx-software.com/2016/02/29/raspberry-pi-3-board-is-powered-by-broadcom-bcm2827-cortex-a53-processor-sells-for-35/ ''Raspberry Pi 3 Board is Powered by Broadcom BCM2837'' on '''CNX-Software'''] *[http://www.cnx-software.com/2016/03/01/raspberry-pi-3-odroid-c2-and-pine-a64-development-boards-comparison/ ''Raspberry Pi 3, ODROID-C2 and Pine A64+ Comparison'' on '''CNX-Software'''] *[http://blog.pimoroni.com/raspberry-pi-3/ ''Raspberry Pi 3 - First Look'' on '''Pimoroni''' blogs] *[https://www.raspberrypi.org/magpi/pi-3-interview/ ''Raspberry Pi 3 - Interview'' on '''MagPi''']
===Models=== *[[RPF Raspberry Pi Model B (512MB)]] - [http://www.raspberrypi.org/product/model-b/ PPage] [http://www.opennet.ru/opennews/art.shtml?num=40202 on '''OpenNet'''] :CPU: [[Broadcom]] BCM2835 @700MHz 1-cores ARM11 :(ARM1176JZF-S); 512MB RAM, 2x USB 2.0 *[[RPF Raspberry Pi Model B+ (512MB)]] - [http://www.raspberrypi.org/product/model-b-plus/ PPage] [http://www.opennet.ru/opennews/art.shtml?num=40202 on '''OpenNet'''] :CPU: [[Broadcom]] BCM2835 @700MHz 1-cores ARM11 :(ARM1176JZF-S); 512MB RAM, 4x USB 2.0 *[[RPF Raspberry Pi 2 Model B (1GB)]] - [http://www.raspberrypi.org/products/raspberry-pi-2-model-b/ PPage] [http://www.opennet.ru/opennews/art.shtml?num=41585 on '''OpenNet'''] :CPU: [[Broadcom]] BCM2836 @900MHz Quad-core ARMv7 :[[ARM]] (Cortex-A7); 1GB RAM, 4x USB 2.0 *[[RPF Raspberry Pi 3 Model B]] - [https://www.raspberrypi.org/products/raspberry-pi-3-model-b/ PPage] [https://www.opennet.ru/opennews/art.shtml?num=43962 on '''OpenNet'''] :CPU: [[Broadcom]] BCM2837 @1.2GHz Quad-core ARMv8 (64-bit) :[[ARM]] (Cortex-A53); 1GB RAM, 4x USB 2.0, Micro SD, FE, HDMI :GPU: ''VideoCore IV'' (@400MHz), 3D-core (@300MHz) :WLAN: [[Broadcom]] BCM43438 1T1R 802.11n, BT 4.1 LE *[[RPF Raspberry Pi 3 Model A]] - ($20) no FE, WLAN :1GB RAM, 4x USB 2.0, Micro SD, HDMI, GPIO, DSI, CSI *[[RPF Raspberry Pi Compute Module 3]] - *[[RPF Raspberry Pi Zero]] - [https://www.raspberrypi.org/products/pi-zero/ PPage] [https://www.raspberrypi.org/blog/raspberry-pi-zero/ Blog] (half size ''Model A+'') :CPU: [[Broadcom]] BCM2835 @1.0GHz Single-core ARM11 :512MB RAM (Elpida B4432BBPA-10-F), Mini HDMI (1080p60) :Micro SD, USB OTG ports, Micro USB data/power, 40-pin GPIO
